figure_1: Treatment of locally inoperable breast cancer and application prospects of INPs. US ultrasound, MG mammography, MRI magnetic resonance imaging, PET-CT positron emission tomography-computed tomography, PAI photoacoustic imaging, FI fluorescence imaging, SERS surface-enhanced Raman scattering, CR complete response, PR partial response, SD stable disease, PD progressive disease, BCS breast-conserving surgery, ALND axillary lymph node dissection, PTT photothermal therapy, PDT photodynamic therapy, MHT magnetic hyperthermia therapy, SDT sonodynamic therapy
figure_2: Bibliometric analysis of INPs applied in breast cancer. A Annual and cumulative trend of publication from 2006 to 2023; B world map of global overview and international collaboration; C 15 clusters of key hotspots divided by CiteSpace software. Distinct clusters are color-coded for identification; D a timeline visualization of 15 clusters generated by CiteSpace software; E keyword co-occurrence analysis map produced by VOSviewer and Pajek.
